title-part.text: COOLING OF MACHINES OR ENGINES IN GENERAL

reference.text: arrangements in connection with cooling of propulsion units in vehicles B60K11/00; heat-transfer, heat-exchange or heat-storage materials C09K5/00;
; heat exchange in general, radiators F28

note.note-paragraph: Attention is drawn to the notes preceding class F01, especially as regards Note (3).
Cooling by lubricant is classified in subclass F01M when the lubrication aspect predominates and in subclass F01P when the cooling aspect predominates.

reference.text: propelling cooling-air or liquid coolants F01P5/00; controlling supply or circulation of coolants F01P7/00; cylinders, pistons, valves, fuel injectors, sparking-plugs, or other engine or machine parts, modified to facilitate cooling, see the relevant classes for such parts

for cooling fuel injectors or sparking-plugs
